accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on 'Sahayak Saffron' is White or extremely dark Navy. Never use grey on saffron.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Outfit' and 'Noto Sans' from Google Fonts in index.html immediately.
HINDI SUPPORT: Ensure all input fields and text rendering support UTF-8 Devanagari script properly.
WHATSAPP FIRST: The WhatsApp integration is the USP. Make the WhatsApp floating action button (FAB) visible on ALL pages.
DIGILOCKER VIBE: Use the 'Guilloch√©' texture subtly in the 'My Documents' section to build trust.
MOBILE OPTIMIZATION: Test all grids on mobile. Job cards must be full width on mobile, 3-col on desktop.
NO BORING TABLES: For Job Lists, use 'Ticket' style cards, not standard HTML tables.
USE SONNER: Replace all alerts with 'sonner' toasts.
DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
